events.message: Customer called to file a claim after being involved in a car collision on the highway last night.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to damage sustained in the car crash.
An agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim and follow up on further requirements.
The customer received formal acknowledgment of the claim submission with initial instructions provided.
Request was made for accident photographs, police report, and insurance details to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos and official police report promptly.
Investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence and conducting interviews related to the auto collision.
The investigation concluded that customer was not at fault, confirming details from police and witness statements.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering all car repair costs and related expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with settlement proposal and prompt handling of the auto accident claim.
Claims department approved the settlement following review and confirmation of all required documents.
Payment for the agreed claim amount was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account successfully.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after all financial settlements were completed and confirmed.
The claim file was archived successfully in the system for future reference and record keeping purposes.
